definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: bite (NH = BH, but also transp. [[נְכַשׁ]] Hiph.); As. našâku Dl:HWB 486; Targum [[נְכֵית]] (esp. of snakes); Syr. nkat, nket; Eth. nasaka: Di:642; Ba:ZMG xliii (1889), 188 cp. Ar. naka3a, undo threads, untwist rope, disintegrate, dissolve);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. [[נׇשַׁךְ]] Nu 21:9, sf. [[וּנְשָׁכוֹ]] consec. Am 5:19, [[וּנְשָׁכָם]] consec. Am 9:3; Impf. 3 ms. [[יִשּׁׂח]] Ec 10:11, [[יִשָָּׁח]] Pr 23:32, sf. [[יִשְּׁכֶנּוּ]] Ec 10:8; Pt. act. [[נשֵׁךְ]] Ge 49:17; pl. [[נשְׁכִים]] Mic 3:5, sf. [[נשְׁכֶיְ]] Hb Hab 2:7; pass. [[נׇשׁוּח]] Nu 21:8; —bite, chiefly of serpent, c. acc., Am 5:19, Am 9:3, Ge 49:17 (poem in J), Nu 21:8 (pt. pass., abs.), v:Nu 21:9, Ec 10:8 also v:Ec 10:11 (abs.), Pr 23:32 (sim. of wine); fig. of prophets [[בְּשִׁנֵּיהֶם]] ´[[הַנּ]] Mic 3:5 who are biting with their teeth, and crying, Peace! fig. of oppression, etc., [[נשְׁכֶיְ]] Hb Hab 2:7 (with play on sense thy debtors, those that give thee interest).

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 pl. [[וְנִשְּׁכוּ אֶתְכֶם]] Je 8:17 and they shall bite you fatally (fig.); Impf. 3 mpl. [[וַיְנַשְּׁכוּ]] [[אֶת־הָעָם]] Nu 21:5 and they bit the people fatally (both of serpents).
